code: import Login from'../pages/Login';import Purchasing from'../pages/Purchasing';import Detail from'../pages/Purchasing/Detail';import Error404 from'../components/Error404';import HeaderOnly from'../components/Layout/HeaderOnly';var token=localStorage.getItem('access_token');var publicRoutes=[];if(!token){publicRoutes=[{path:'/',component:Login,layout:null},{path:'*',component:Error404,layout:null}];}else{publicRoutes=[{path:'/',component:Login,layout:null},{path:'/purchasing',component:Purchasing,layout:HeaderOnly},{path:'/purchasing/detail',component:Detail,layout:HeaderOnly},{path:'*',component:Error404,layout:null}];}var privateRoutes=[];export{publicRoutes,privateRoutes};
